meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.10 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.10 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x and Log4j 2 CVE-2021-44228
meta.summary: A recent CVE-2021-44228 has been disclosed that affects the Log4j 2 library. The Vert.x project can optionally use Log4j but does not ship it and therefore is not affected by this CVE.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.6 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.6 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community and provides a couple of features

meta.title: Checklist for Migrating from Vert.x 2.1.x to Vert.x 3 - Part One
meta.summary: So while upgrading our application, I thought I should note down all the changes that we had to do in the process. Since Vert.x 3 is a major upgrade from the previous version, with so many changes.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.9 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.9 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.

meta.title: Getting started with new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin
meta.summary: The all new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin allows you to setup, package, run, start, stop and redeploy easily with a very little configuration resulting in a less verbose pom.xml.
